description: Super easy dip which is a crowd pleaser. The mixture can be prepared ahead of a party and bake when ready to serve hot.
name: Spinach Dip in Cob Loaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mixture into the cob and place the lid. Add the bread pieces in a single layer around the cob. Bake in oven for 20 minutes at 160 degrees fan forced. Serve hot.
